queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-external-dns-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{external-dns-operator}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-external-dns-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{external-dns-operator}}.resources.limits.memory is undefined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-external-dns-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{external-dns-operator}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-external-dns-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{external-dns-operator}}.resources.requests.memory is undefined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-external-dns-operator.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=release-name-external-dns-operator.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-external-dns-operator.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=release-name-external-dns-operator.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-external-dns-operator}}.rules[8] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-external-dns-operator}}.rules[8] is granted read access (verbs: create, get, patch, list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-external-dns-operator}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined
